Requirement for Verification of Service
Before the Disability Rating Activity Site (DRAS) prepares a final rating decision for an Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES) participant on active duty at the time of the referral into IDES, it must verify the participant’s
character of service, and
date of discharge.
A
DD Form 214, Certificate of Uniformed Service
, satisfies the requirement for verification.  If a
DD Form 214
is
not
of record, use all available resources to obtain Military Services Coordinator
participant’s Military Services Coordinator
VA Defense Information Repository data in Veterans Tracking Application (VTA)
Defense Personnel Records Information Retrieval System (DPRIS)
Veterans Information Solution (VIS), and
Personnel Information Exchange System (PIES).
References
:  For more information on
DPRIS, select the HELP tab on the
DPRIS website
(Registration is required.)
VIS, see the
VIS User Guide
, and
PIES, see the
PIES User Guide
.
